scripts.start:
docker compose up -d && echo '
Ghost starting at http://localhost:2368
Admin: http://localhost:2368/ghost/
'
scripts.clean: docker compose down -v && echo 'All local Ghost data removed'
scripts.package: cd themes && zip -r chris-theme.zip chris-theme -x '*.DS_Store' -x '*node_modules*' && echo 'Theme packaged: themes/chris-theme.zip'
